text:
Adan Santiago lgut (March 12,2009 in Philippines),also known by his stage name as Adan lgot,is a Filipino child-actor he a cast of Cinderella boy (2019 film)that has got a IMDb score of 86% and have an award of FAMAS Award.he was best known because winning the other award also the Best Child Actor in 2020 he's notable studio are Hearty Channel and Blue Star Entertainment Philippines Film studio.he is announced to be part of the cast in Tom and Jerry (2021 movie)
Adan Santiago is an Filipino child actor known for he's work as Alfred in Cinderella boy (2019) that made him became a famous child actor he got an award for it the Best Child Actor in 2020 and it is awarded on 36th PMPC star awards that make his work more notable and after the award they made a three good sequel and he's last movie is Cinderella boy 3 Part:Chaddy daughter of Cinderella boy and it is released on March 28,2020.he is now need to continue he's studying and he tell that because he retired of acting to give the other kids a chance to act in Hearty Channel and Blue Star Entertainment Philippines Film.And Later became an actor of United States
Adan Santiago audition to Hearty Channel and Blue Star Entertainment Philippines Film for one time and he got approved by only one audition at the company the company said that "He is a talented kid and we want to make him famous and be discovered to the world " the team approved him as a role of Alfred or in the other called name Cinderella boy and that's why he was discovered because of he's notable work as Alfred first he became nervous for first time but the sequels he is not nervous anymore it's just he knows he's way of acting and he's last movie of Hearty Channel are Descendants Chaddy daughter of Cinderella boy and tommorow the Company Hearty Channel and Blue Star Entertainment Philippines Film has been closed because they have no more budget to make a film the Hearty Channel and Blue Star Entertainment Philippines Film are closed in March29,2020 and that's why he's other explanation why he retired of acting.And later he became an actor of United States.
Early Life.
Adan Santiago Igut was born on March 12,2009,in Montevista Davao de Oro,he is born on his house he is the first child of Maryjane Igut and Ronald Igut he's brother and sister today is all an actor even his parents his brother are Francis Ad Igut the second child of his parents also he's brother and a Filipino child actor and his sister Princes Marisa are the 3rd child of his parents and she is also an actress and his little brother the 4th child Ronald Jr. Also an child-ctor and comedian.
He's school are in Montevista Central Elementary School and he's inspiration to become an Actor is to be the first people in Montevista to become an Actor he start auditioning and been approved only one time audition in Hearty Channel and Blue Star Entertainment Philippines Film and a role of Alfred in Cinderella boy (2019 film).
Career.
Adan Santiago Igut is an Filipino child actor known for he's work as Alfred in Cinderella boy (2019) that made him became a famous child actor he got an award for it the Best Child Actor in 2020 and it is awarded on 36th PMPC star awards that make his work more notable and after the award they made a three good sequel and he's last movie is Cinderella boy 3 Part:Chaddy daughter of Cinderella boy and it is released on March 28,2020.
He do it because he wants to make other kids be discovered on Hearty Channel and Blue Star Entertainment Philippines Film but he is so sad when the Hearty Channel and Blue Star Entertainment Philippines Film has been closed and he said "Why you never give other kids a chance,I understand Hearty Channel and Blue Star Entertainment it's fine but there's other companies of film you can go with them Now I'm Happy".And later he became an actor of United States.
Personal Life.
He is a student at Montevista Central Elementary School he is the first child of Maryjane Igut and Ronald Igut and he wish to become an actor and it came true but he is sad when the company closed and now he makes other kids tell to become an Actor cause acting are very interesting.
He is now studying to modules because of the pandemic of Coronavirus he is a grade 6 student today at 2020 also at 2021 he will gonna study well to make his new a dream come true afte having done on being an actor of the Hearty Channel and Blue Star Entertainment Philippines Film.and later become an actor of the United States.
